{"id":958850662,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 days, 8 hours","timestamp":1685260034,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/958850662/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost to Make All Characters Equal","memory":"12.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minimumCost(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++) {\n            if(s[i] != s[i-1]) ans += min(i, n-i);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-to-make-all-characters-equal","has_notes":false}
